title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.18 - Recipient
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.18 - Recipient

State Regulations

Recipient means a person who is, or has been, receiving
a covered program or service. For the purpose of this Part, recipient includes
a former recipient seeking to review a determination of a social services
agency and who would have a right to a hearing under section
358-3.1
of this Part if such
person were a current recipient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
